data.name: FilterResults
data.value: Optionally enter a search term to filter the results

data.name: ReceiveEmailNotificationAboutNewResults
data.value: Receive email notification about new scraped results

data.name: WatchdogOnboardingReceiveNotification
data.value:
You can disable email notification about new results.

Email notifications about new results are currently free. In the future, free notifications about new results will be available only to a limited number of watchdogs without premium subscription. The premium subscription is not yet implemented.

data.name: OnboardingViewAgainStep
data.value: You can view this help anytime again.

data.name: DeleteScraperConfirmationMessage
data.value: Really delete this scraper and all related user's watchdogs?

data.name: ContactSupport
data.value: Need help? Contact support team at

data.name: About
data.value:
A watchdog for any publicly accessible web page.

Keep track of changes and get notified by email the moment a page updates or your search term appears.

View public {0} or create your own scraper, and create a watchdog.

data.name: EmailAddressRegexAttribute
data.value: The {0} field is not a valid email address

data.name: StringLengthAttribute
data.value: The field {0} must be a string with a maximum length of {1}.

data.name: LoginLinkSentDescription
data.value:
A login link has been sent to your email {0} . Check your email, and confirm the login by clicking the login link.

Waiting for the confirmation...

If you can't find the email, please check your spam folder and mark it as Not Spam to ensure you receive future emails from {1}.

data.name: YouHaveBeenLoggedInDescription
data.value:
You've been logged in on your original session.

Close this page and return to your original session.

data.name: PublicScrapersDescription
data.value: Browse public scrapers to create a watchdog.

data.name: MyScrapersDescription
data.value: Browse your scrapers to create a watchdog.

data.name: PublicStatusTooltip
data.value: The scraper is public and discoverable by other users.

data.name: RequestedToBeMadePublicStatusTooltip
data.value: The scraper has been requested to be made public and discoverable by other users.

data.name: PrivateStatusTooltip
data.value: The scraper is private and not discoverable by other users.

data.name: LoginOrRegisterToCreateWatchdog
data.value: Log in or register to create watchdog

data.name: ManageOtherUsersScrapersDescription
data.value: Manage scrapers created by other users.

data.name: NoScrapedResultsMatchingTheSearchTermAvailable
data.value: No scraped results matching the search term {0} are currently available.

data.name: NoScrapedResultsAvailable
data.value: No scraped results are currently available.

data.name: ScraperResultsOnboardingIntro
data.value: You are on a page showing scraped results of a scraper.

data.name: ScraperResultsOnboardingWatchedWebPages
data.value: This scraper periodically scrapes web page(s) and selects scraped results from them.

data.name: ScraperResultsOnboardingSearchTerm
data.value: You can enter a search term to filter the scraped results.

data.name: ScraperResultsOnboardingCreateWatchdog
data.value: Create a watchdog with email notification about new scraped results or new scraped results matching the search term.

data.name: ScraperResultsOnboardingLoginOrRegisterToCreateWatchdog
data.value: Log in or register to create a watchdog with email notification about new scraped results or new scraped results matching the search term.

data.name: ScraperCreateOnboardingSetName
data.value: Enter the scraper name. In the next step you will define web pages to scrape.

data.name: NumberOfDaysBetweenNotificationsForTheSameScrapedResult
data.value: Number of days between notifications for the same scraped result

data.name: NumberOfFailedScrapingAttemptsBeforeAlerting
data.value: Number of failed scraping attempts before alerting by email

data.name: RangeAttribute
data.value: The {0} must be greater than or equal to {1}

data.name: TheWebPageHasBeenAutomaticallyDisabled
data.value: The web page has been automatically disabled.

data.name: ToEnableItMakeSureTheWebPageIsSuccessfullyScraped
data.value: To enable it make sure the web page is successfully scraped.

data.name: PleaseEnableItOnceYourEditsAreComplete
data.value: Please enable it once your edits are complete so that watchdogs can continue watching it.

data.name: MakeScraperPublicConfirmationMessage
data.value: Really make the scraper public and discoverable by other users?

data.name: RequestToMakeScraperPublicConfirmationMessage
data.value: Really request to make the scraper public and discoverable by other users?

data.name: MakeScraperPrivateConfirmationMessage
data.value: Really make the scraper private and non-discoverable by other users?

data.name: UrlAttribute
data.value: The {0} field is not a valid http or https web address.

data.name: HttpHeaders
data.value: HTTP headers (one per line; format: "header name: value")

data.name: ScraperEarningsCalculationInfo
data.value: The scraper earnings calculation will be based on the number of premium users having a watchdog for this scraper. The premium subscription is not yet implemented.

data.name: NumberOfUsersWithWatchdogWithEmailNotification
data.value: Number of users with a watchdog with email notification

data.name: NumberOfUsersWithWatchdogWithoutEmailNotification
data.value: Number of users with a watchdog without email notification

data.name: ErrorDescription
data.value: An error occurred while processing your request.

data.name: InvalidHttpHeaderFormatErrorTemplate
data.value: Invalid HTTP header format: "{0}". Expected format is "header name: value".

data.name: ScraperDetailOnboardingIntro
data.value:
You navigated to a scraper management.

This scraper will scrape web pages and will select results based on the CSS selector.

data.name: ScraperDetailOnboardingAddWebPage
data.value: Add a web page this scraper will scrape.

data.name: ScraperDetailOnboardingScrapingInterval
data.value: You can change the scraping interval.

data.name: ScraperDetailOnboardingViewScrapedResults
data.value: View scraped results to be able to create a watchdog with an email notification about new scraped results.

data.name: ScraperDetailOnboardingRequestToMakePublic
data.value: Request to make the scraper public and discoverable by other users who will then be able to create a watchdog with email notification about its new scraped results.

data.name: ThereAreNoPublicScrapers
data.value: There are no public scrapers. You can create a scraper {0} and later make it public.

data.name: WatchdogOnboardingIntro
data.value:
You navigated to your watchdog.

This watchdog emails you notification about new results of the related scraper.

data.name: WatchdogOnboardingIntroScrapedResults
data.value: It periodically watches related scraper results.

data.name: WatchdogOnboardingIntroSearchTerm
data.value: You can enter a search term to filter the results. When no results, or no results matching the search term are currently available, you will receive an email notification as soon as they are available.

data.name: YouHaveNoScrapersCreated
data.value: You have no scrapers created. You can create a scraper {0}.

data.name: AddNewWatchdogRecommendation
data.value: To add a new watchdog, go to the list of {0}, select one, and choose {1}.

data.name: ScrapeHtmlAsRenderedByBrowser
data.value: Scrape HTML as rendered by a browser

data.name: ScrapingByBrowserWaitForDomContentLoaded
data.value: HTML loaded; images and CSS not loaded

data.name: ScrapingByBrowserWaitForNetworkIdle
data.value: HTML, images and CSS loaded; no network activity for 0.5 seconds; highest chance of all scripts to complete
